original: intros m x y i j Inv Prec. pose (y0 := cA m zero y). pose (y_1 := cA_1 m one y). pose (x1 := cA m one x). pose (x10 := cA m zero x1). pose (dx := MF.degree m x). pose (m1 := L m one x y). intros Heq_y0_x Expf Cond1 Cond2. assert (1 <= j + 1 + i) as Ineq by lia. destruct (expf_dec m x y0) as [Hx | Hnx]. - apply diff_cF_L1_y_1_x10 with (j := j); auto. + apply Inv. + apply Prec. + unfold y0; rewrite <- Heq_y0_x; apply Expf. + auto. - apply expf_L1_x_y0 in Hnx; auto. assert (expf m1 y_1 y0) as Hy_1. { apply expf_y0_y_1; auto. } apply expf_L1_I_CS with (z := y_1) in Hnx; auto. + intros Hiter. apply Hnx. apply expf_trans with y_1; auto. + intros H. apply Hnx. apply expf_trans with y_1; auto.
